title: Error building SkiaSharp
body:
Hello,

I trying to compile SkiaSharp. When running the ".\bootstrapper.ps1 -Target everything" I get an error:

I did not find the arm folder on the specified path
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/28917934/38602242-d9d88e84-3d72-11e8-88a3-c7f0d2554186.png)

What should i setup to get the result?
